analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0xd7d11099792b6bf5ee8db04813680147f8b831df.sol:
	Contract POPKOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0xd7d11099792b6bf5ee8db04813680147f8b831df.sol#219-220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
